long_description: The Osprey Shuttle 32 is a sleek wheeled gear hauler with a streamlined design. It offers plenty of room for big adventures and features a wide, stable chassis. Osprey Shuttle is durable enough to handle being thrown in the family wagon, strapped on top of a train or shoved into a plane's cargo hold. Ergonomic retractable grab handle and 3 dedicated grab loops ensure easy hauling and lifting during all phases of your trip. Shock-absorbent polyurethane wheels roll smoothly and have a high-clearance design so they won't get caught on bumps and curbs. 16 in. wide chassis is built to be stable, lightweight and ultra durable. Main compartment is accessed by both a panel and bellows pocket opening each with lockable dual zippers (locks sold separately); interior panel divides main compartment into 2. Features 2 internal organizer pockets and compression straps. Outside pockets include a top, dual-zippered stash pocket, a top single-zip slash pocket, a full-length, vertical side zip pocket and zip front slash pocket. Includes a hideaway courier bag attachment strap and a retractable business card/name tag holder. Compression strap system secures both large and small loads for increased stability; integrated strap keepers organize loose straps.
short_description: The Osprey Shuttle 32 is a sleek wheeled gear hauler with a streamlined design. It offers plenty of room for big adventures and features a wide, stable chassis.
